product_name: The North Face Jester Daypack - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The North Face Jester Daypack for women carries your gear in comfort from school to the trail-no joke! Large main compartment offers ample space for large items; front organizer pocket and key clip keep small items from getting lost. Injection-molded shoulder straps are flexible, ventilated and shaped to fit a woman's contours; the hipbelt can be removed when not needed. Strap a travel mug, bike helmet and extra clothing onto the external bungee system. 2 side mesh pockets provide storage for your water bottle and room for small essentials. Foam padded back panel helps protect back from bulky textbooks and lets you carry your load in comfort. Reflective patch increases nighttime visibility. Closeout.
short_description: The North Face Jester Daypack for women carries your gear in comfort from school to the trail-no joke!
